1.content: There's a lot of games out there, so let's go through the possible storylines.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: There aren't a lot of characters in this game to focus on. Here are some possible storylines.
11.title: Uncharted Series

choices: You set it to shrink and zap yourself
You set it to grow and prepare to zap Nate
You set it to shrink and prepare to zap Nate
111.content:
You're in a shack. Cracks of sunlight peek through the makeshift window and the wooden boards. Secret intelligence had informed you that this was indeed the correct spot. Any minute now Nathan Drake would return here, resting up for the evening. How had you obtained such information? Well that was a secret of course.

To your right is a large table like object, half a tree stump you assumed. Deciding that it was a good hiding spot, you quickly duck behind it, facing the currently closed shack entrance. In your hand is a special device. A size changing ray, obtained from the same people who had given you the information and had transported you here.

The shack itself is pretty plain. Other than the table there's a simple bed, a wooden wardrobe, an eating area and a corner with several bandages and equipment. Modest really. You weren't all too surprised.

Suddenly you hear the crunching of leaves outside and then, footsteps coming closer and closer to the shack. Quickly you look down at your device and adjust the settings. You wanted to get the things going as soon as Nate walked in.
111.title: Nathan Drake

choices: Your goal is to get his attention...by running out and making noises
Your goal is to get his attention...by climbing onto something and into his view
Your goal is to be extra sneaky...for your own entertainment
1111.content:
Fumbling at the switches, you turn the knob until it was pointing at "shrink". Turning it around you aimed at yourself and a moment of without hesitation you pressed the button, closing your eyes as the gun shot out a singular beam of light at your face. You knew exactly how the process played out, although not really the science behind it all. You could feel the molecules rearranging in your body, twisting and changing as you shrunk. The process was quick and painless and soon you opened your eyes, greeted by the merry sight of a giant wooden stump the size of a large wall in front of you.

No time to take in your surroundings though, because the sound of the shack door opening soon filled the air. Quickly you hurry to the edge of the stump, peeking out from behind it. At first you're distracted by how different the things in the room looked from your size but soon your gaze sets on your prime target.

Standing at the doorway was the gigantic form of Nathan Drake, decked out in his typical outfit, scarf included. The light shining from outside seemed to encompass Drake's body, seemingly causing a glow all around him. Even though you were at least a few regular feet away he still looked like a god to you, handsome and towering. As you scanned upwards, tilting your head back you deduce that you were the size of a toy to him. He could grab you in one hand and hold you captive. It was amazing and wondrous.

You watch him scan the shack before making his way inside, his powerful boots hitting the ground with force as he walked about, unaware of the tiny guest watching him. It seemed like a perfect time to make your move.
1111.title: Shrinking Yourself

choices: Nathan Drake has been hit and is now growing rapidly in the tiny shack
Nathan Drake has been hit and knocked unconscious
Nathan Drake has been hit and is now dazed and stumbling out of the shack
1112.content:
Without hesitating you jump up, aim the gun at the door frame and zap, ignoring the surprised yell coming from your target. The ray which came out was a blinding white flash that filled the room and forced your eyes shut. You hadn't expected the thing to have been so blinding, but then again you had never used a size changing ray in the first place. Despite having no vision you still tried to step backwards but fell when you hit the same stump of tree you had tried hiding behind moments ago, landing backwards and hitting your head painfully against a blunt object.

Meanwhile you could hear a loud yell coming from the direction of the doorway - Nate's voice no doubt as the light engulfed him completely, rearranging the molecules within his body and his clothing. As it transformed him the light began to dim and you could barely open your eyes to see weird figures and bright shapes. The ray gun hadn't come with a manual so you weren't sure what was happening exactly. But one thing was certain and it was that the shack you were in was shaking violently, the walls compressing against some unknown force. Instinct told you to get out, but you weren't sure if that was even possible.

A few more seconds and the light began to fade rapidly. Bracing yourself you took another peek.
1112.title: Zap Nate

12.content: Not a lot of characters in this series.
12.title: Dishonored

choices: Corvo has shrunk you for his testing purposes!
Corvo has shrunk you but you escape before he does and get out of his vision
121.content:
You don't know how this happened. One moment you were hiding out in your apartment, too scared to go outside and gulping down plague medication like everybody else. The next, a masked assassin appears in your window and threatens you with a knife before tying you up and knocking you out. Now you found yourself bound and gagged on a chair in a dimly lit room with your prison guard staring intently at you from the shadows.

"I apologize for this." Eventually after moments of silence the masked man spoke. "But I can't just test this on myself you see. It's unfortunate you were in the wrong place at the wrong time."

The man walked forward, letting the dim light from above shine on his face. Now that he was closer you could see he still had his mask, a white and grey metal contraption shaped like a skull. He was dressed in a dark hooded grey cloak and wore an utility belt filled with dangerous looking weapons. In one hand he held a knife. In the other was a glowing glove.

"I'll just cut to the chase then." The masked man raised his gloved hand at you. "You may have heard of me. Corvo Attano. And today you're my test subject."

Before you can react a bright beam shot out from the glove as magic suddenly engulfed you. Unable to see through the light you struggle against the chair, making loud muffling sounds as you bit on the dirty rag in your mouth. Something was definitely happening and there was nothing you could do. The question was, what exactly was going on.
121.title: Corvo Attano

choices: You're shrunken, the size of a bug, on the chair
Somehow you ended up on the ground, the size of a rodent
You're on a piece of rope, hanging off the chair, extremely small
1213.content:
Soon the light began to fade and you frantically try to make sense of what's happened. Firstly you notice that the gag and ropes are gone and you're able to move your hands freely. Secondly you realize you've been transported somewhere. The world around you looks completely different, filled with vast colorful shapes of large sizes-

No wait. It couldn't be. As you looked around you realized something. The colors were familiar, the shapes as well. You haven't been transported to another world. No, you were still in the same place, the same dark room. The only thing was, you had shrunk. Either that or everything around you had grown to titanic sizes.

There's not a lot of time for you to react and your vision is quite blurry trying to adjust to the new view. A loud voice mutters something and you realize it must have been Corvo, even though you can't see him. "Where the hell..."

So that was what Corvo meant by experiment. He had shrunk you and you had no idea what was coming up next. Lucky for you though it seemed that Corvo had lost track of you during the process, probably a result of the poor lighting. Lucky you. Looking around you tried to deduce where you were.
1213.title: Lost Tiny

13.content: There are quite a few choices here.
13.title: Metal Gear Solid

choices: The device works and Snake has become a giant.
134.content:
It'd been roughly two or three years since I moved into the west end of Alaska and began my work for the organization " Philanthropy". I had no combat experience at the time, so I was placed in both the Intel and R&D teams instead, seeing as how those were my previous strong suits. The fact they were willing to hire me seemed kinda miraculous in it of itself, but the fact they placed me in positions in which I could provide support to those out there in the field seemed almost deliberate. Even so, I valued my posts like they were the most valuable sets of jewelry, especially when I was given the opportunity to aid the man himself, Solid Snake, on his missions. Ever since I first caught wind of this guy's feats and accomplishments, the only job I could've ever wished for was to assist him any way I could.

When I wasn't busy sending out information or providing feedback to my comrades, I'd often pay a visit to Dr.Emmerich's workshop to help out on whatever new equipment his eccentric mind could come up with. It went pretty good for awhile, but...I distinctly remember this one " stand-out" moment that nearly got me dismissed from Philanthropy.

It was a fairly busy morning at base, seeing as how Snake had just announced his eventual boarding of some tanker in a few days. In order to prepare for this mission, several of our R&D members, including Dr.Emmerich and myself, went full force into creating some new gadgets for the mission. A lot of them failed miserably, but there were a few which earned Snake's consideration. One of which was a special device which could alter the user's size from average to ginormous or minute. At first I thought it was a joke, but then I actually thought of it as a legitimately useful piece of equipment in terms of a battlefield.

" Think about it, a soldier could become small enough to easily sneak past enemy troops or large enough to tower through all of their obstacles." was my argument to have it used during the mission. Snake, however, was very skeptical and wished to try out it's effectiveness on himself. I was chosen to perform this task, despite me not making it. But, I ultimately caved in and decided to head out to the helipad to test it. Snake simply stood directly in front of me as my hands shivered in fear of messing this up somehow. I twisted the knob and aimed at Snake...
134.title: Snake

choices: The narrator goes through the op and heads to the helipad.
The narrator drops out and spends the day in his quarters.
1341.content:
To my horrified amazement, the device actually worked ! Within a matter of a few seconds Commander Snake had grown just as tall, if not more, as the two story helipad that towered over those of us stationed there ! The test seemed like a rousing success, well, to all except our commander of course. " This is ridiculous." he muttered in his raspy voice " Soldiers like us shouldn't be using this sort of equipment in our field of work. You, whatever your name is, shrink me back to normal size ! I've got a word to have with you and Otacon. Well, do it already !". Fumbling around with the various knobs and buttons strewn about on the device, I ultimately found the correct set of frequencies and blasted at Snake.

To everyone's seeming disappointment, our commander slowly shrunk back to his average state before dragging me by the arm to his quarters, hollering at both me and Dr.Emmerich as we made our way along the gray brick road to his own lair of Oz. By the time we finally reached our destination, Snake had already given Dr.Emmerich a piece of his mind and I was next in line. Once the door we were always warned about entering finally opened, I was pushed to a rickety computer chair while Commander Snake sat in front of me. " Listen,"he steadily began " We're stealth fighters, not full on commandos. This type of gadget really doesn't suit us. Hell, it doesn't suit any army ! But...I can see how you were ecstatic about the test being a success.". With a subtle wink, I could already what he was about to bring up.

" It's not a secret to anyone here Y'know. Everybody, including me, have seen those pictures you have in that desk of yours. Not to mention we saw 'signs' of your...little obsession.". A blush and quick wave of shame rushed through me so fast I couldn't even formulate a single correct sentence. " I mean, as long as it doesn't interfere with our plans and your ability to give us support, I honestly don't mind. It's kinda odd, but that's coming from a man who fought against both a shaman and a telepath. Regardless, after our next small op in the next four hours or so is over, meet me at the helipad with that size changing device. I have a bit of a surprise for you.". And with that, Commander Snake simply trotted away, leaving me in a wild state of embarrassment. I was excited, yet nervous for what was about to happen.
1341.title: The device works and Snake has become a giant

choices: Desmond blackmails Shaun into worshipping his bare feet
Desmond makes Shaun sniff his bare feet
15511.content:
"Hey Shaun?" Desmond called him from across the sanctuary.
"What?" Shaun didn't even look at him.
"Have you seen my socks? They keep going missing." Desmond asked.

Shaun went tense as his thoughts wandered to the collection of Desmond's sweat stained socks he hid under his bed.

"Nope." Shaun said, his voice an octave higher.

"Huh." Desmond sounded suspicious. "Guess I'll just sleep barefoot." He yawned and pulled off his ratty shoes, which revealed his muscular, sweaty bare feet.

"Night." Desmond called as he padded over to his sleeping bag. Shaun listened to the sound of Desmond's bare soles slapping against the floor as he made his way over to his sleeping bag and settled into it.

When Desmond starting heavy breathing, Shaun finally looked back; he was fast asleep.

Lucy and Rebecca were on a girls night out, this was a perfect opportunity.

Shaun crept over to the spot where Desmond had left his worn old sneakers, checking once more to make sure he was asleep, Shaun picked one up and brought it close to his nose.

He inhaled deeply and moaned in pleasure at the sour sweaty stench of Desmond's stale foot sweat, built up after a night of freerunning around monterigioni.

He picked up the other shoe and sniffed that one too, it was just as pungent as its brother.

"I knew it" Shaun heard Desmond's voice

"Oh bugger" he cursed
15511.title: Desmond Miles

choices: Ezio sees how much damage your body can take and crushes you under his sole.
Ezio sees how long you can sniff his feet before you pass out.
15512.content:
Ezio returned to the villa after a long day, exhausted and drenched in sweat. his servants informed him that they had drawn him a bath in his room on the top floor, he was glad for this opportunity to relax, but he had business to attend to first.
It had been just over a month now since Ezio had used the apple of eden's power to shrink you into his own personal slave. you stood at barely 7 inches tall and were allowed nothing to wear but a thin loincloth.
'Ahh.' Ezio said, upon seeing you curled up on the floor of his bedroom. 'My little slave, good to see you again.
you gulped.
Ezio flashed a wide, cocky grin and began to toe off his left boot with his right. he stood there for a moment, struggling, then his sexy tanned foot came free and a sour-cheesy stench originating from the boot began to fill the room. He repeated this process with his right boot, which he toed of with his now bare left foot.
'All week I have been working for my order, not once have I been able to take these boots off.' he sighed, scrunching and wiggling his sweaty toes.
'Now.' he lifted his bare right foot and held it close to your body, it took all your willpower not to gag at the stench, you could see some dirt and gunk on his soles.
'Lick.' he commanded.
you had no choice, you stuck out your tongue and began lapping at the pungent foot while Ezio moaned in pleasure and rubbed his manhhod through his trousers.
Your eyes watered at the stench but you kept licking and tasted nothing but dirt and sweat on your tongue.
'Let's play a game.' Ezio said, a mischievous grin on his face.
15512.title: Ezio Auditore da Firenze

choices: The guardian suddenly grows into a giant on his throne!
The guardian reaches out and shrinks you!

15533311.content:
You push open the grand, icy doors with pride. Weeks of adventuring, struggling through the frozen tundra with little more than a blanket to keep you company, you've finally arrived at the magnificent ice palace. The palace that stored the sacred ice crystals. There were a little more than a myth prior to today, but now, they were within your grasp. At least, close to within your grasp.

As you entered the empty, reflective hall, you realize your last obstacle awaited you. Sitting in a grand throne of ice, directly opposite of you, across the room was a man decked in royal blue robes, had white frosted hair and piercing blue eyes. In one hand he carried a staff with shards of ice coming out of one end. In the other was a glowing mound of magic, blue and shimmering. It was the Crystal Remnant. Protector of the ice crystals.

The man stared at you intently, eyes fixed on your body as he spoke. "...A visitor? It has been decades, perhaps centuries since the last adventurer found their way here." The ice guardian shifted on his throne and beckoned you closer with a finger. "Yes... you are quite valiant for braving the cold. But it was all for naught. I cannot allow you to have the powers of the crystals so easily adventurer."

You stopped, standing in front of the throne. Getting a better look at the man you saw he was quite handsome but his expression was cold and unnerving. His clothing was decorated with tiny shards of ice and his boots were a silver metal mix, no undoubtedly composed of the minerals trapped within the ice. A high blue collar covered the lower half of his face. Compared to you, he was dressed like royalty. Then again, you'd probably die without all the equipment you had on.

"The power of the crystals can be yours...if you can withstand my power adventurer."
15533311.title: Palace of Ice

choices: The giant ice guardian proceeds to stomp you out!
The guardian has a challenge for you! Reach the top of his head!
Your experience as an adventurer allows you to nimbly fight the giant
155333111.content:
"Behold!"

The ice guardian raised his free hand in the air and began channeling. A dark blue ball began to form. As you looked onward, you realized you probably should get out of the way. Who knows what was going to happen?

Taking a few steps back, you watched as the light surrounded the man. To your surprise, the guardian began expanding in size, his body and his throne increasing in massive overall. The ice guardian was turning himself into a giant! You were in awe and shock as you watched the transformation. So this was your final task, to fight a giant ice mage!

Taking more and more steps back you watched in horror as the crystal remnant expanded, laughing wickedly as he did. His body quickly doubled in size and then tripled within seconds. Soon you had to tilt your head back to look wards, as the ice guardian's face rose higher and higher into the seemingly endless ceiling of the mystical palace. It wasn't long before you found yourself standing, shocked in front of the now massive giant, looking at his gigantic forum in suspense. If you were to fight someone of his stature, you'd surely be overpowered.

"Look in fear adventurer! Behold my power!" The crystal remnant spoke loudly. As you looked up, you realized the guardian was many times your height. Judging by how you only came to barely half of his boots height, you estimated he was probably ten time your size. Sitting on his ice throne, the guardian was a sight to behold.

But you couldn't look on for long, for the battle had begun. To him, you were barely the size of his hand, and he was ready to take you down without even standing up.

The ice guardian shifted his left leg and your attention was drawn to the massive steel crystal boots that towered before you. It looked like he was going to have the first move.
155333111.title: Giant Ice Guardian!

choices: You realize that's not the king...
15533312.content:
Deep in the forest there lived many magical creatures, away from the prying eyes of mankind. Perhaps the most beautiful and magical of them all were the fairy nymphs, a tribe of flying creatures of all sizes, all extremely beautiful in appearance. Most of the tribe were women, with men being outnumbered one to ten. That was the reason men were greatly treasured. As soon as the men became of age they had to undergo a special rite of passage with the fairy king, a human with arcane magic that could control the mystical gems that the fairies needed to survive. As a man many of the fairies worshipped him and tended to his every need.

You had just come of age, being one of the fortunate few to be born as a male fairy. Your gender made up for the fact that you were only a few inches tall. As with all other male fairies you had prepared for your rite of passage with the fairy king, whom you knew only as Meliai. Traditionally fairies wore decadent robes when they underwent the passage but you had chosen a simple outfit, a breezy shirt, loose fitting pants and a necklace with an tiny emerald in it, to signify your status. Once the rite of passage was completed, Meliai would replace the emerald with a gem of his choosing.

As you flew towards Meliai’s throne room you began to feel nervous. The “king” housed himself in an extravagant chamber, sealed off from others during a fairy’s rite of passage. Accompanying you was two ogre guards, both bigger than you that walked stupidly alongside your floating body, controlled by the king’s magical gems. One of the guards looked at you as you approached the entrance of the throne room. “Don’t worry. The king knows what he’s doing.”

Taking a deep breath you watched as the golden doors swung open to reveal a long red carpet. As you went in you heard the doors shut tightly behind you, locking you inside. As if he was ready for it, Meliai appeared in a blanket of purple smoke.
“So little one. You are my company for tonight?”
15533312.title: The Fairy King

Your jaw dropped. Meliai, the king of the fairies was sitting on his golden throne a couple feet from you. The only thing that filled your mind was how handsome he was. Meliai wore satin blue pants decorated with extravagant patterns, an orange vest that was open, showing a row of well-defined abs. Around his neck was a large golden necklace, adorned with purple gemstones. He had a small goatee on his chin and piercing opal eyes. On his ears were earrings with large purple diamonds dangling on the ends. His hair was a messy windswept mess. He was youthful, gorgeous. In human years, he couldn’t have been older than 21. The magic kept him immortal.

“Please little one. Tonight, I am all yours.”

15533321.content: Some very interesting choices in this game
15533321.title: Fallout 3

15533322.content: There are quite a few characters here, so let's start with the obvious ones: your companions.
15533322.title: Fallout: New Vegas

choices: "You know Boone...maybe you can make better use of this."
"Actually, maybe we should ask a professional first."
155333221.content:
"I don't know if this is safe." You turn the vial carefully in your hand. "We found it in a room in the Sierra Madre. Even if it does what it says, the toxins could have seeped in."

"We won't know till we try it."

Looking up, it was hard to tell through his shades if Boone had much of an opinion on the vial, a small tubular thing with dark purple liquid you had picked up from one of the rooms in the Sierra Madre. What had caught your eye was the label - Size Transformation Manipulation Stock Ad 3. Could it change the size of whoever drunk it? Initially you had searched the casino for anything that gave information on the strange concoction, but many dead terminals and ghosts had kept many of the areas sealed. Still, something like this seemed pretty powerful, and it would help immensely in the wastelands.

But still...you had learned the hard way not to trust what you find, especially when it was from a dead casino littered with toxic fumes. But the temptation still called to you. The fascination of what the liquid was for and thoughts of what it would be like if you could change sizes at will. Sure the auto doc could get you facial surgery, but nothing like this.

"I guess you're right. I'm...I'm still kind of worried though. Maybe you want to have a taste? Or I could have it. Just be sure to get the medicine ready in case if something bad happens. We still have contact with Julie right?"

Boone shrugged.
155333221.title: Craig Boone

choices: Boone, who lets out a yell as he begins to grow in size!
You, who thinks maybe the formula was a dud.
Someone nearby who identifies the formula!
1553332212.content:
You examine the vial a few more times, gazing at the liquid swirling within. There didn't appear to be any cracks, and you couldn't see any traces of the telltale blood red mingling within the shades of purple. You were excited for the possibilities, but knew firsthand that ingesting anything from the Sierra Madre could result in a few hours of unconsciousness at best. And from the presence of several dozen corpses, death at the worst.

What you needed was a test subject, and luckily, there was one not 2 feet away from you. You weren't the best doctor, but you figured that at the very least, you would do better in the event of an emergency than Boone. The man was a hell of a spotter, but not exactly the smartest fella in the desert. You felt a pang of guilt over taking advantage of him like this, but if it actually worked, it'd make for a hell of a story to tell back at the Lucky 38.

"You know, Boone... maybe you could make better use of this." You stepped over to him and passed the vial into his hands.

A raised eyebrow was all the response that the sniper elicited, "Me? What the hell could I do with... "Size Transformation Mani-pu-lation Stock Ad 3?" He'd leaned in to get a better look, squinting to read the small handwriting that'd been scribbled on the side.

In all honesty, you were stumped. While you could justify a size alternating formula for your personal use as being useful for stealth missions, it was hard to use such reasoning on Boone. What use would a sniper who can't even hold his rifle be? Of course, if he grew large enough, he wouldn't need a rifle anymore, he could just use his size to intimidate any potential threats or flat out crush them if that failed. The idea of a giant Boone towering over New Vegas was quite appealing indeed.

"I thought it would be better to have a guinea pig test it out first," you said with a smirk, "And you were the first person who came to mind, congratulations!"

"Gee, thanks," he replied, flipping you off with his free hand before removing the cork with a small, 'pop!' He glanced once more at you, then turned back to the vial and raised its contents to his lips. A grimace told you that the scent wasn't pleasant and with a quick flourish, he chugged the entire vial in one gulp. He stuck out his tongue in mock displeasure and you could see that it'd been dyed a deep purple, the same colour as the liquid.

You stood with intense anticipation, fists clenched at your sides as you tried to hide your excitement. You hadn't counted on him drinking the entire thing, but knew that it was probably his way of getting you back for making him take it in the first place.

The two of you stood in an awkward silence as several minutes went by. Eventually, the silence was broken by...
1553332212.title: Candidate Boone

choices: Boone continues growing into a massive 50 foot giant!
Boone's growth has stopped, making him a 3 story tall giant
Boone continues growing, but you're in danger!
15533322121.content:
Suddenly a loud yell escaped from your companion's lips as his face twisted and contorted with looks of pain. Nervous and excited you took a few steps back, unsure of what to do. Was the mix faulty? Poisonous? Had you just instructed someone to consume a life threatening potion? Sure you had medical experience but who knows what kind of disease was ridden in the-

"A-AH! Fu-" Your panicked thoughts were quickly replaced by shock and awe as Boone feel over onto his knees. The only thing was, even though he was kneeling over, the top of his head matched yours completely. It was working! Frantically you scrambled backwards, taking yourself as far from the danger zone as possible, but you didn't get far.

With a loud yell and a surge of growth Boone stood up, his firsts clenched tightly on either side, his feet in a firm standing position. At his new height he was probably almost half as tall as he was before and he showed no signs of stopping.

Crawling backwards you stared, jaw dropped as he expanded rapidly, his head shooting upwards, far into the sky. His massive legs and feet expanded forwards and sideways and you soon found yourself in a safe spot to watch the spectacle as both of his assault boots became massive walls on either side of you, trapping you between the open area in between. Looking up you followed the path that was his legs, upwards Boone's crotch and all the way across his chest and his head, now many many feet above you. It was Boone alright, except now he was the size of a massive statue, possibly taller than many of New Vegas' three story casinos and from what you could see, Boone's eyes were still clenched shut and his arms were still flexed tightly. His growth had seemed to have taken a pause...or did it.
15533322121.title: Growing Boone!
